name: umbrella
description: An umbrella repo that hosts all the LUME projects as git submodules in order to centralize management of all the projects.
// NOTE: Any field starting with `//` is intended as a comment.

scripts.install: npm run update-modules && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap --no-ci --ignore '{,readem}' --ignore-scripts --loglevel notice -- --loglevel notice && lerna bootstrap --no-ci --scope '{,readem}' --ignore-scripts
scripts.// ^ bootstrap: Bootstrap everything except readem, and then readem by itself, to avoid a circular link. (lume->readem->lume).
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 2: TODO bootstrap readem along with cli, so that cli is linked into it. Maybe the scope would be {readem,cli}
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 3: We use --ignore-scripts so that the bootstrap doesn't run prepare scripts. We want it to only put dependencies in place. A subsequent lerna build step builds everything in correct order. Otherwise some packages will try to build themselves before dependencies are in place.
scripts.purge: (lerna run clean || true) && npm run unbootstrap
scripts.// ^ purge: 'lerna clean --yes' removes all node_modules while 'lerna run clean' runs each project's particular 'clean' script.
scripts.reset: npm run purge && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.docs: npm run build && cd packages/lume && npm run docs
scripts.docs:publish: git push && ssh infamous@trusktr.io "cd ~/lume+lume && npm run update"
scripts.build: npm run clean && lerna run build
scripts.// ^ test:ci: Concurrency needs to be 1 in CI for some reason, but I forgot to comment why.
scripts.dev: echo ' --- TODO: dev script for running everything in dev mode. For now, cd into each packages and run dev manually.'
